title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1290.10 - Tampering with controls, equipment, etc. prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1290.10 - Tampering with controls, equipment, etc. prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall tamper with any World Trade Center
controls, machinery or equipment including without limitation thereto
thermostats, heater valves, sprinkler valves and devices, or blower motors, and
no person shall turn on or off heating or air cooling controls in the World

Trade Center or operate any other equipment therein unless expressly authorized
in writing by the Port Authority to do so. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1290.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
